title: flexible product paths
extract: Flexible manufacturing definition. The general definition of flexibility is: being responsive to change, adaptable. ... Having a rigid manufacturing process consists of having a single product that can be produced in a given operation. If the process needs to be modified, it can not be quickly adapted.Apr 9, 2014
extract_html: Flexible manufacturing definition. The general definition of flexibility is: being responsive to change, adaptable. ... Having a rigid manufacturing process consists of having a single product that can be produced in a given operation. If the process needs to be modified, it can not be quickly adapted.Apr 9, 2014
